<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1275757_exploren.ExploreNowFatchDeatils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ExploreNowFatchDeatils</name><script><![CDATA[var ExploreNowFatchDeatils = Class.create();
ExploreNowFatchDeatils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    userDetails: function() {
        var id = this.getParameter('sysparam_userid');
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        gr.get(id);
        var userObj = {
            "email": gr.getValue("email"),
        };

        return JSON.stringify(userObj);

    },
    type: 'ExploreNowFatchDeatils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-11-20 06:18:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>8f559da083421a101fd516dfeeaad324</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ExploreNowFatchDeatils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ExploreNow" source="x_1275757_exploren">c75a2bb2833112101fd516dfeeaad318</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ExploreNow">c75a2bb2833112101fd516dfeeaad318</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8f559da083421a101fd516dfeeaad324</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-11-20 06:30:42</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
